title: Blended Instructional Strategy Design for Universal Design for Learning (UDL) Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of Foundational Instructional Design Theories and Social Studies Curriculum
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment centered on smartphone-based learning activities. Development of practical instructional design cases through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three core principles of UDL (engagement, representation, action/expression) to social studies curriculum design.
Learners can design at least two types of UDL-compliant activity materials based on smartphones in resource-constrained technological environments.
Learners can develop inclusive education project plans based on an analysis of diverse learner needs.

resources: Translated Version of CAST UDL Guidelines
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
